data.title: Awesome Mexican
data.text: A small hole in the wall Mexican restaurant that doesn't disappoint. I highly recommended restaurant that is a good deal on the price. I would recommend combo 19, the rolled tacos.

data.title: Delicious Food - Friendly Staff
data.text:
We were at a bar close by that didn't serve food, and were told we could bring it in to eat. Walked across the parking lot to get the food to go and am GLAD I went here to get food for 4. Woman who took my order was friendly and got the order out quickly.

The burritos we had were very tasty; the sides were plentiful. My wife had beef tacos and her only complaint was that the meat was rather plain tasting. Not so bad she wouldn't eat, but just a bit plain.

Would definately go back here for quick, good mexican food.

data.title: Great tasting food
data.text: My husband stopped after a day of shopping.  Great food selection and a reasonable price.  Guy at the counter was nice.  Food was delicious! The only reason I didn't rank it perfect is because the tables were a bit dirty and ambiance.  Otherwise it was great! Will certainly stop again.

data.title: Great food, great prices
data.text: This place has wonderful food, friendly staff and the dining area is clean. Marcydiner tantrum scale of 5/5-no screaming kids.  Fairly fast to get your order as well and you get alot of food.

data.title: Eating late?
data.text: Its challenging to find a decent place to eat when you've worked late, its after 10 pm and you need a quick dinner.   Abelardo's is number one in my book for that.    I like to grab a quick taco salad or a couple of tacos, select a sauce and salsa from the condiment bar and I'm on my way home in a few minutes.   Have always had fast, friendly service, and their food is delicious.

data.title: Surprisingly yummy
data.text: My fiancée and I went here two weekends in a row!   They have an extensive menu and you order at the counter.  We ordered carnita quesadilla, 2 tongue burritos and the taqueria with cheese and guacamole. The burritos were freaking huge you only need one and the tongue has a lot of flavor!  The carnitas were bland but they have this amazing salsa bar to spice up your meal if you choose!  The taquitos were good.  They do deliver your meal.  There is a drive thru and breakfast menu which we haven't tried.  There was only one family there besides us so they are a diamond in the rough!

data.title: EXCELLENT
data.text: The menu is huge, tons to choose from.  The food is very fast, the staff is friendly and the food is excellent.  quality food at great prices, one of the best in the area.

data.title: Gigantic
data.text: My husband & I stopped in for lunch and were pleasantly surprised. The portions were huge; we easily could have split a plate. They also had corn tortillas, which we like better. The flavors were great, and my husband loved the salsa bar.

data.title: A Different Take On Fast Food Mexican
data.text:
We stopped by for lunch as we were passing through Des Moines. We read reviews about several fast food mexican places and this was closest to where we were so we stopped. The menu is extensive and covers all the bases of what you expect. We ordered a half order of chicken nachos, 3 taquitos, a side of beans, an order of 3 fried tacos and one of the combination plates. 

The order of nachos was VERY large. There were plenty of toppings and it was enjoyed. The Taquitos were very small and the filling was bland. The combination plate was large and very good. The fried tacos were fried flour tortillas (I expected corn) and were greasy. The tacos were good, but not what I had expected. I tried three of the sauces on the salsa bar (the non-neon green, the red and the chuncky). Some labeling on the bar would be helpful, as it is impossible to know spice level each one is. Luckily for me, I have an iron tongue so this was not an issue. I liked all three that I tried, and noted there was a level of spiciness to each one.

Overall, this was a different take on the usual fare and overall it was good.

data.title: Very Good Food, Cleanliness lacking
data.text: I agree with the majority of the reviewers here that the food at this place is very good, especially for Mexican fast food.  It's also cool that they have a salsa bar so you can add the toppings you like, although it would be helpful if they would label the items so you know which toppings are spicy vs mild.  We have eaten at the Urbandale location several times and I recommend the drive through.  The restaurant is old and smells like fried food.  In addition, the tables aren't frequently cleaned and it's just not a pleasant environment.  I try to review the restaurant as a whole, hence the average rating.

data.title: Awesome
data.text: Absolutely love this place.  Affordable and delicious. I have eaten at pretty much every Mexican restaurant in town and this is the best by far.

data.title: BEST BREAKFAST BURRITO, ever...and I'm from Texas!
data.text: Oh my gosh...like this burrito was better than one I can make at home!  I'm from Texas and I know TexMex and how to make a mean burrito and enchilada.  I had the Bacon, Egg, hashbrown and cheese burrito...could be enough to feed two people but I was starving and ate the whole thing!   It was served piping hot and I had 5 salsas to choose from.  The price was under $5...this place can't be beat.  I wish they would expand to Texas...it would give a lot of places down here a reason to improve on their menus.

data.title: Taste of a sit-down restaurant, speed of fast food
data.text:
Abelardo's (or Ab-lardo's as my wife calls it) is terrific, classic Mexican restaurant dishes served up with a fast-food timing and environment.  We love the fajitas!  It is always enough for at least two meals.  I get the beef, my wife gets the chicken.  I always get a chile relleno on the side and we have chips and salsa.  The service is fast, the food is great and you can drive through and enjoy your meal at home! 

There is also one on Ingersol in Des Moines.

data.title: Wow
data.text: This is the most bang for your dollar you will ever find . If it's not on the menu they will make it for you great place to eat.

data.title: Best Mexican Fast Food Ever
data.text: Prettty much anything that you order here will please you.  It is very afordable and they are open 24/7 and have a drive thru....
